author: Simon James Finch
content: I connect via WiFi and App is very intermittent by phone... I only see my ink levels about 1 in 50 times I connect... Initially I moaned about tablet support (as with tablet connected to WiFi then it can't connect to printer) but actually tablet is much better... Connect tablet to WiFi, Open HP app, Login & when printer appears, Switch tablet to printer... This always seems to work & I can finally Scan reliably. Still not perfect as Print Dashboard needs internet so that doesn't work :(

content: very good

content: I can never get my printer to connect and it pmo.

author: Justin McLendon
content: sucks

author: Alex Chaney
content: anti-consumer practice that locks the printer behind using specifically HP ink. I got my account locked for for buying third party ink and trying to use that. I will never purchase from the HP brand again.

author: F
content: I tried to use this app to just print something via my phone quickly. It first allowed me to use the app as a guest. It autodiscovered my printer (on the same network) easily enough, and yet when I went to print something I was required to sign in. No HP, I'm not going to create an account with you to use my own local printer. Would've been 1 star but it did actually autodiscover the printer instantly. Props to the dev that built that feature.

author: Wilma Bohage
content: Terrible.

author: gaurav jalan
content: Kindly add double side /two sided printing option to save pages.

author: carmen ramirez
content: I'm trying to print my second single page in many mouths and my printer requested to print the alignment 3 times, after printing 3 times a white page (I mean just didn't print) it started just not printing at all... I just added a new cartridge, the printer is in good condition..... ah, but they charged me for the alignment prints and suggested me to buy a monthly plan since I am printing so much. the AI customer service doesn't understand what is my problem (doesn't have this options).

content: my printer reads not available yet wifi is operating on my phone and TV. so I don't know what the problem is but I'm quite frustrated.

author: Sonia Rivera

author: Cameron Madden
content: Pathetic - Cannot connect to an OfficeJet Pro 8020 via the same wifi network. Tried many times on 2 mobiles (cell phones) and 1 tablet. I can connect to other brands of printer except HP. What happened? HP used to be good brand, but is useless now. Being objctive here. Fix this to prove me wrong and I will change my review immedately. HP Smart(?) cannot find a printer via the same network nor via jetdirect.

content: I just received my 2nd printer utilizing the ink and new printer option. Hopefully this will work out for me!

content: took ages to set up a while back. such a pain. Last used my printer 2 months ago. I can't even use it now after the update. Just will not connect. seriously had enough.
